ygData.subject: Re: zoning
ygData.msgSnippet: How can it be dependent on bandwidth..  my brother has a p3 450 with a 28.8 connetion.. he loads faster than me using a p2-333.  and the guy from sweden only
ygData.messageBody:
How can it be dependent on bandwidth.. my brother has a p3 450 with a 28.8
connetion.. he loads faster than me using a p2-333. and the guy from sweden
only takes 8-10 secs. to load.. i think Shane had an interesting comment..
how much extra drive space do you have.. i remember that the installation
instructions stated that there is a requirement for a minnimum of 150 mb.
Any load times about 30sec between zones is highly unusal. Youve got a
problem that goes beyond our disscusion. Like i said before the data that
is sent to your machine at anytime is quite compact and requires very little
transfer time. Its system dependent when reference to load times..

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: Shannon Upham [mailto:shannon@...]
Sent: Friday, May 07, 1999 8:34 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] zoning


From: "Shannon Upham" <shannon@...>

It must be dependant on bandwidth more than anything else. I have a similar
computer as below: 350 128 meg 16 meg video with a cable modem. I zone in
about 8 - 10 seconds.

shannon
Jugit Warrior 10
-----Original Message-----
From: Lary, William <WLary@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 06, 1999 6:54 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] zoning


>From: "Lary, William" <WLary@...>
>
>
>
>
>Hiya
> i have a amd 400mhz 64mb of ps100 ram 16mb video card-banshee
>and an awesome creative 128bit sound card. however i have NEVER zoned in
>less than a minute, usually more, i know a lot of it is processor
>i have hit zones withgroups and i am the last one to wake up so to speak
>the others had p2 350mhz etc i do have a 33.6 modem so i think it is
>the modem connection that makes the biggest difference, i wish my work
>computer had a cd rom drive installed, its just a p266 with 80mb but the
>45kps T1 connection would surely be nice as opposed to my
>3.5 to about 4.0kps i get with my 33.6 modem. does anyone out there
>play on a recommended p200 or above system req and use a T1?
>i wold love to know the zone times ya get:)
>Doublestar
